Submodules¶

ovs.blob module¶

Blob interface code

class ovs.blob.Blob(app=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Blob is the implementation for azure blob storage

PROFILE_PICTURE_CONTAINER = 'profile-picture'¶
__init__(app=None)[source]¶

Initializes the Blob object. If app is not provided init_app must be called before use.

create_blob_from_bytes(container, name, byte_array)[source]¶

Wraps create blob from bytes service

delete_blob(container, name)[source]¶

Wraps delete blob service

exists(container, name)[source]¶

Wraps exists blob service

get_blob_to_bytes(container, name)[source]¶

Wraps get blob to bytes service

init_app(app)[source]¶

Initializes the Blob object

ovs.blob.make_file_name(container, name)[source]¶

Builds filename for testing from container and id

ovs.config module¶

Config is for all the particular setup details such as the app environment, database name and ip, super user account details, etc…

class ovs.config.OVSConfig(config_path=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Used to load config from a file. Ex:

config = OVSConfig(‘config/config-local-dev.json’) print(config[‘database’])

The configuration should be edited by editing the JSON directly, and cannot be changed in code.

get(key, default_value)[source]¶

Fetch the value associate with the key in the dictionary.

Parameters:
  • key – The key to acess the dictionary.
  • default_value – The default value if the key is not mapped.
Returns:

The value associated with the key or default if key is not mapped.
items()[source]¶

Fetch all dictionary items.

Returns:A list of key, value tulpes.

ovs.database module¶

Database interface code

class ovs.database.Database(app)[source]¶

Bases: object

Database is the implementation for app.database and provides sqlalchemy with a target.

engine()[source]¶

Get a handle to the database engine

instance()[source]¶

Get a handle to the database

ovs.datagen module¶

Data generation class

Bases: object

Data generation class

static clear_db()[source]¶

Empty the DB for tests

static create_default_room()[source]¶

Creates default room if it doesn’t exist

static create_defaults()[source]¶

Populate the database with defaults

static create_user()[source]¶

Creates a default user if it doesn’t exist

Module contents¶

ovs is the root module of the Overseer application. It sets up flask and makes a database connection. The networking code can be found in ../main.py

ovs.create_app(config_path=None)[source]¶

Creates a Flask app instance and returns it
